name: myf-db-systool
description: 小型公司进出货 + 账务系统

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build:prod: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && NODE_ENV=production npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/dist backend/dist node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules
scripts.test: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build
